title: Bug 6656: Close button moves down when view resized smaller
OB: When the Navigator view is resized smaller on Linux using build 20011127 (does not happen on build 20011116 on Nt2000), the two tool items move below the label.
EB: The two tool items should stay on the same line as the label regardless of the view size. This behavior is a usability problem as users are accustomed to the close button being on the same line as the label and located to the far right corner.
SR:
1. Launch the application on Linux.
2. Open the Navigator view.
3. Resize the view to a smaller size.
4. Observe that the tool items move below the label.
